website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality tablet floor stand that is ideal for video chatting, watching movies and much more.
pros: Offers a maximum height adjustment of 4.4 feet
Stand is able to support any tablet or cell phone up to 10 inches
Easy to assemble in just minutes
cons: Base offers limited stability, and the stand may tip at times depending on its position

customer_reviews.title: This sure makes life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.text: The weighted base could be a little heavier but otherwise it's perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this face saver!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing! I got one for laying in bed reading at night so I wouldn’t have to hold the phone, or drop it on my face an embarrassing amount of times. My husband promptly stole it to hold his tablet for the same reason. I bought a second one right away. We both have used them for months and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Queen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Super easy to assemble and very sturdy. I was concerned that the base would be to lightweight and easily topple over as others have done. NOT THIS ONE! The base weighs approximately 5 lbs. I got one for my mom who is a stroke survivor and has limited use of her left hand making it difficult to hold the phone and play her puzzle games. This is ideal for holding her phone for her. The arm swivels and there’s a knob that tightens it so that u get the exact angle you want and it stays there. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tranquil Wood By Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works great when used gently.
customer_reviews.text: I used this primarily for FaceTime on a 9.7" iPad while sitting up in bed. iPad fits, even in a folio case. Stand is not flimsy on the level that I expect it to break, but the base is not every heavy, and the arm wobbles in the mount. I have had to use a wrench to tighten the post, and that helped, but it isn't perfect.
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, was the closest thing I could find to fit my needs. The unit itself feels sturdy expect for the plastic tablet/phone holder; the plastic here feels cheap and I am not sure how well it will hold up in the long term. I am using this to hold my tablet when streaming games from Stadia so I don't have to hold my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Royib812

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like is the pipes keep coming loose. It would be better if they would stay tight. I love other than that it makes it easier to read and work from my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for hands-free watching of videos either on a smartphone or tablet. Base heavy enough to support the two upper arms at a right angle to the bottom post with a tablet (the most unstable way you can use it). Wobbles a bit if touched but that's to be expected. And you can easily set it up for either a chair or a bed.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional stand
customer_reviews.text: Have had several iPad stands and all of them don’t compare to this one. Very easy to position and is Sturdy. Very easy to place or remove iPad from holder. Does not seem flimsy or breakable like other iPad holders. Best stand I have owned so far. I use it for iPad but can be used for similar size devices/ phones.

customer_reviews.title: Fell Very Short of Expectation!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for a very short while. It is obviously not meant for heavy continuous use. Very shortly after purchasing, it started falling apart. The screws came out, it started squeeking, the springs popped off, and the overall design just fell apart. It was a nice setup but obviously just not meant to hold up! For the price of this product, I would have anticipates it to have held up for years not a few months! If you plan on rarely using it, it may be right for you and stand up to time but if you plan on using it alot you might want to find something better! Very unhappy with this product
